text: Cyd Charisse (March 8, 1922 â€“ June 17, 2008) was an American actress and dancer. She was known for her roles in Singin' in the Rain (1952), The Band Wagon (1953) and Silk Stockings (1957). Charisse was born in Amarillo, Texas. She was married to Tony Martin. Charisse died in Los Angeles, California from a heart attack, aged 87."Legendary dancer Cyd Charisse dies" , CNN.com; accessed November 4, 2014. ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2008 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American dancers Category:Actors from Texas Category:People from Amarillo, Texas
